name: Ningyo
speed: walk 0 ft., fly 60 ft., swim 60 ft.

trait.name: Aquatic
text: The ningyo can breathe only underwater and can hold its breath for 1 hour.

trait.name: Curse Of Ill Fortune
text: When a creature that the ningyo can see attacks the ningyo and misses, the attack is automatically redirected against another creature within 5 feet of the ningyo or the attacker. This attack uses the same attack roll.

action.name: Multiattack
text: The ningyo makes four barbed tentacle attacks.

action.name: Barbed Tentacle
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d6 + 5) piercing damage plus 5 (1d10) poison damage.

reaction.name: Share Pain
text: When the ningyo takes damage, it can choose to take half the damage instead. The ningyo then chooses a creature within 60 feet. The target must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or have disadvantage until the end of its next turn as it is wracked with the pain of the attack.
